item.title: JASMIN Webinar - March 2025
item.description: On Wednesday 26th March, 10.00 - 12.00 GMT The CEDA//JASMIN team will be presenting a webinar to provide an update and describe new services available on JASMIN. Following the presentations there will be a Q&A session with the speakers and other members of the JASMIN team to give you an opportunity to ask questions.
